entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 12:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon then to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain later this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower early this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to snow and ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
